it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game

Class TurnManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.TurnManager

  • public class TurnManager
extends java.lang.Object
    class which hadle the turn mechanics
    • game: the game which this instance of turn manager must handle
    • period: the current period
    • roundID: the current round
    • turnID: the current turn
    • update: if setted true the turn order must be updated
    • turnOrderQueue: the queue containing the UUID of the players which represent the turn order
    • memoryTurnOrder: get trace of the past turn order, is needed by updateTurnOrder() to update the turn order
